compatibility.notes: The GFDL-1.2-no-invariants-or-later license has a strong copyleft effect, meaning that any derivative work must also be distributed under the same license. This can lead to incompatibility with permissive licenses.

key_requirements: The Document must contain a notice that it is licensed under the GFDL.
Any distribution of the Document or its Modified Versions must be under the same license.
license.name: GFDL-1.2-no-invariants-or-later
obligations: You must include a copy of this license when distributing the Document.
You must state changes made to the Document if you modify it.
You must keep the same license for any Modified Version of the Document.
